name: debuting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
debut
to perform or appear in public, or to be shown or introduced to the public, for the first time: The Broadway show debuted last year to great acclaim. The museum recently debuted a brand-new, never-before-seen exhibit, "Living in Space."
